document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">lane </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Yellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">led </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">eye </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Purple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Wood </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">soft </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">inhabitants </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Surpasses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">solitude </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Bird </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">silence </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">contradict </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">flower </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">presume </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">show </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">low </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">West </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Impossible </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A lane of yellow led the eye
